page.title: 03LLANBISTER C.P.SCHOOL
page.content: Llanbister school is in it's own grounds.There is a main building with two classrooms and a canteen, and another small building for the infants There is a playground with a football pitch, a hopscotch board and a snake painting as decoration. Behind the infants class is a gooseberry bush In the grounds are climbing frames trees and grass we have also got a sand pit. We do maths, english and folder work. We also do timestables,map work, drama,religious studies,work tests and science. The school dinners are not nice now they are frozen and delivered by van. The cook does not enjoy her job as much. There are three teachers and about fifty children aged from four to eleven years old. at eleven you go ten miles to the highschool.
